content.raw:
I'm unable to reproduce the problem (`Failed to load plugin libgazebo_ros_api_plugin.so`) using the nightly releases.

I'm running the following versions, which are the latest available:

~~~
$ dpkg -l | grep nightly
ii  drcsim-nightly                              2.5.2~hg20130509r844cd73465a0-1~precise   Darpa Robotics Challenge (DRC) simulator
ii  gazebo-nightly                              1.7.3~hg20130509r096ec69b95be-1~precise   3D dynamics simulator for robotics
ii  osrf-common-nightly                         1.0.6~hg20130509r0ca0ece5b122-1~precise   Software and messages used in multiple OSRF projects
ii  sandia-hand-nightly                         5.1.13~hg20130509rd0e4c0173a28-1~precise  Software, firmware, and simulation models for the Sandia Hand
~~~

With those versions installed, I do the usual `source /usr/share/drcsim/setup.sh` and then am able to launch various qual and vrc_task worlds, without a problem.

You've identified an inconsistency between the version reported by the Gazebo and the version embedded in the nightly debian package.  We ought to correct that, but it shouldn't actually cause you any problems.

To be clear, if you're going to use any of the -nightly packages, you need to use all of them.  The dependencies are set up that way, as are the conflicts, which ensure that you can't have, say, `drcsim` and `drcsim-nightly`, installed at the same time.

Perhaps you got into an inconsistent state by updating just one of the -nightly packages.  E.g., if you already have all the -nightly packages installed, and you `sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install drcsim-nightly`, you won't necessarily get a new version of `gazebo-nightly`, which might be needed.  That's an easy trap to fall into; I've created a [ticket](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/issue/16/make-version-requirement-on-nightly-debs) to fix it.

In the meantime, to ensure a consistent set of debs, I recommend explicitly uninstalling the -nightly packages before upgrading any of them:

    sudo apt-get remove drcsim-nightly gazebo-nightly osrf-common-nightly sandia-hand-nightly
    sudo apt-get update
    sudo apt-get install -y drcsim-nightly
